channel.title: CVE Feed for BUFFALO INC. -- WXR-1900DHP2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BUFFALO INC. -- WXR-1900DHP2

item.title: CVE-2018-0522|2024-08-05T03:28:11.098Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wxr-1900dhp2
item.description: Buffer overflow in Buffalo WXR-1900DHP2 firmware Ver.2.48 and earlier allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted file.

item.title: CVE-2018-0523|2024-08-05T03:28:11.129Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wxr-1900dhp2
item.description: Buffalo WXR-1900DHP2 firmware Ver.2.48 and earlier allows an attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0521|2024-08-05T03:28:11.054Z -- buffalo%20inc. -- wxr-1900dhp2
item.description: Buffalo WXR-1900DHP2 firmware Ver.2.48 and earlier allows an attacker to bypass authentication and execute arbitrary commands on the device via unspecified vectors.
